overview:
Joe Caggiano has more than 25 years of experience in business, technology, and the U.S. Navy.

He began his career serving several tours of duty on the USS Independence, at the Navy Shipyards, in the Pacific, and at the Navy Personnel Command during the first Gulf War.

After the Navy, Joe moved into business working for such high profile companies as Pfizer, WR Grace, Arthur Anderson, and Deloitte. At the latter two, Joe focused in technology - Knowledge Management, Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP), Business Intelligence, and Business Performance Management - with a strong track-record of growth in each area for each company.
